name: .M1PG File Extension
summary: Learn about .M1PG files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Video file created with Media 100 iFinish, a professional video cutting and editing program; saved in a proprietary format that can only be opened by Media 100 software.

content: The iFinish program is no longer developed and has been replaced by Media 100 Producer, which is only available for Mac OS X.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
